comment: Easy class, but beware- attendance is most of your grade. you get 1 free absence, then each absence after that is a letter grade off. miss 5 classes, instant fail. Tardiness counts too- 3 tardies= one absence. Emily is very nice and funny but the attendance grade part sucked.

the class actually made me like yoga & as a person this professor is pretty nice. but if youre like me and dont have much motivation to get up and actually go to class i wouldnt recommend it. its easy to fall behind without noticing and she doesnt really care about making up attendance until the end when its too late. i loved the class though

Prof Berreth is a GREAT choice for intro yoga! She tries to make the class engaging. Participation is the majority of grade. Miss 1 class for no penalty, miss 5 and you fail. Makes sense tho since its yoga. Weekly journal assignments that are easy, occasional discussion posts. Big assignment at end of the semester and a final. TAKE HER!

Easy class. There is a journal you have to keep up with throughout the semester and a final exam, but neither are difficult. As long as you show up, participate, and follow the criteria for graded assignments, you'll be fine.

Best professor Ive ever had over. She wants you to do well and will do everything she can to make that happen. I took her for yoga and pilates and loved every second of it. Just make sure you get the book and go to class. Easy A!
She was amazing and made everyone relax well! Do get the book or at least take notes if you can because the final was kind of hard if you dont remember things she says. Either way, I loved her!

Excellent class! But be aware that it is not simply exercising and you will have to write a midterm essay & have a final exam.. Kind of surprised me & she is a bit of a tough grader haha! Overall great class though, just be sure to purchase the textbook!
Nicest professor. Truly a great Pilates instructor.
